titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to provide to Congress a briefing on any instance of an attempted breach of certain military installations.
To direct the Secretary of Defense to provide to Congress a briefing on any instance of an attempted breach of certain military installations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to brief Congress on any instance of an attempted breach of a military installation under DODâ€™s jurisdiction during the period beginning on January 1, 2021, and ending on the date of the provision of such briefing. Each briefing must include a statement of the applicable immigration status and citizenship status of each perpetrator of an attempted breach.
